data.title: I Am Curious (Blue) Original 1972 Japanese STB Tatekan Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1972 Japanese STB tatekan poster for the 1968 film I Am Curious (Blue) (Jag ar nyfiken - en film i blatt) directed by Vilgot Sjoman with Maj Hulten / Vilgot Sjoman / Lena Nyman / Borje Ahlstedt.
data.text:
